title: need more players for ranked team (plat +)
body:
Looking for plat or higher player to join our ranked team DinoCrisis
I have already trialed a few players but we need a few more to fill in if we're going to play everyday

Currently need another  JG and SUPPORT so that we have a backup player in every role

replies.body: Hello, i can play supp/mid/top/jg consistently, currently Plat II
